channel.title: [637] Client/Source - Compile / Run errors
channel.description:
Well I thought I'd try and upgrade to a 637 ( been working on a 317 ) so I downloaded a 637 (torvapkz) just to see how I'd like it.. and for starters, when I try and load the client it gets stuck on "Checking for updates 1%" and is just stuck there...
When I try and run the source I get this error [code]Error: Could not find or load main class server Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
When I try and compile the source I get this [code]Compiling Torvapkz... The system cannot find the path specified. Complete Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
any help for ANY of these problems is GREATLY appreciated. Thank you :D

item.title: [637] Client/Source - Compile / Run errors
item.dc:creator: @99rangek0 99rangek0
item.description:
@99rangek0 wrote:

Well I thought I’d try and upgrade to a 637 ( been working on a 317 ) so I downloaded a 637 (torvapkz) just to see how I’d like it…
and for starters, when I try and load the client it gets stuck on “Checking for updates 1%” and is just stuck there…

When I try and run the source I get this error

Error: Could not find or load main class server Press any key to continue . . .

When I try and compile the source I get this

Compiling Torvapkz... The system cannot find the path specified. Complete Press any key to continue . . .

any help for ANY of these problems is GREATLY appreciated. Thank you
